body: I'm not sorry but if you read this comment, you'll have a girlfriend in the next few months. To activate this blessing, paste this in other comment sections 3 times...
Thnx for 4 parts.. waiting for part 5 :3

This rewrite and the original both suck such a dumb story. The people don’t even act like real people compared to some of the other works. I don’t understand why out of all this guys work this was the one to get 3 fucking parts. I wish he did 3 parts for literally any of his other stories. Also, to make matters even worse we get a fucking rewrite of this stupid story with another stupid story lmao. FML
Good rewrite. The "original" doesn't make any sense. Thank you!
